name: Monogame Platformer
description:
A platformer I made as an example for my upcoming stream series on

my Youtube Channel .

where I will be making this platformer from scratch with monogame

and C#.

The source code is available for download here(for 2 usd)
and for Patrons the code repository is available on Github.

The platformer code which I will be making on my Stream will be available

to all for free after the series has been completed! 

So be sure to hit the bell icon and subscribe to my channel to get notified about the stream!

Controls:

WASD - To move

Esc -  To Quit

Enter - To Shoot

R -  To Restart
